update.available: Uhlaziyo lukhona. Cofa apha ukuze ulukhuphele.

onboarding.title: Wamkelekile!
onboarding.s1_desc: Kufuneka ukhuphele ikopi ye-Doki Doki Literature Club. Oku kunokufumaneka kwiwebhusayithi esemthethweni (ddlc.moe) - cofa iqhosha elingezantsi ukuze uye apho ngoku.
onboarding.s1_platform: Xa ubuzwa, khetha ukukhuphela ifayile enegama elithi "DDLC ({0})".
onboarding.s2_desc: Nje ukuba ukhuphelo lwakho lugqityiwe, lukhethe usebenzisa iqhosha elingezantsi.

login_input.details: I-imeyile iya kuthunyelwa kule dilesi. Cofa ikhonkco kwi-imeyile ukuze ugqibe ukungena.

uninstall_confirmation.details: Idatha yakho yokugcina ye-{0} iya kucinywa, kwaye uya kufuna ikopi yemodi ukuze uyifake kwakhona.

mod_delete_confirmation.details: Kuya kufuneka ukhuphele enye ikopi yemodi ukuze uyifake kwakhona.

save_delete_confirmation.message: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukucima idatha yakho yokugcina?
save_delete_confirmation.details: Kuya kufuneka uyiqale kwakhona i-{0} ukusuka ekuqaleni.

install.description_achievements: Qhubeka udlala ukuze uvule izinto eziphunyeziweyo ezininzi.
install.description_screenshots: Cofa u-S ngelixa udlala ukuze uthathe isikrini.
install.description_sdk: Le modi ixhasa iimpawu ezikhethekileyo nge-Doki Doki Mod Manager SDK!

install_creation.title: Faka i-DDLC
install_creation.description_vanilla: Ikopi ecocekileyo ye-DDLC iya kwenziwa. Idatha yokugcina iya kohluka kwezinye iikopi zomdlalo.
install_creation.description_vanilla_global_save: Ikopi ecocekileyo ye-DDLC iya kwenziwa. Idatha yokugcina iya kwabelwana ngezinye iikopi zomdlalo (umzekelo, i-Steam)
install_creation.description_modded: Ikopi ye-DDLC iya kwenziwa, kwaye imodi iya kufakwa. Idatha yokugcina iya kohluka kwezinye iikopi zomdlalo.
install_creation.description_modded_global_save: Ikopi ye-DDLC iya kwenziwa, kwaye imodi iya kufakwa. Idatha yokugcina iya kwabelwana ngezinye iikopi zomdlalo (umzekelo, i-Steam)
install_creation.status_exists: Loo folda sele ikhona. Khetha elinye igama lefolda.

tab_store_placeholder.title: Ivenkile iyeza kungekudala!
tab_store_placeholder.description_1: I-database yeemodi yeSayonika iya kubonelela ngendawo ephakathi yokwabelana, ukukhuphela kunye nokuphonononga iimodi ze-DDLC. Xa iSayonika ifumaneka esidlangalaleni, uya kukwazi ukukhangela iimodi apha kwi-Doki Doki Mod Manager.
tab_store_placeholder.description_2: Ngelixa ulindile, zive ukhululekile ukukhuphela ezinye zezi modi ezicetyisiweyo.
tab_store_placeholder.error: Ayiphumelelanga ukulayisha uluhlu lweemodi. Ingaba awukho kwi-intanethi?

tab_store.title: Ivenkile yeSayonika
tab_store.subtitle: Fumanisa kwaye ukhuphele iimodi ze-DDLC
tab_store.offline_message: Okwangoku awukho kwi-intanethi. Nceda ujonge uxhulumaniso lwakho lwe-intanethi kwaye uzame kwakhona.
tab_store.maintenance_banner: Iinkonzo zokuqinisekisa azifumaneki okwethutyana ngenxa yolondolozo. Usenokukhangela iimodi kodwa awukwazi ukungena okanye ukubhalisa.
tab_store.no_mods_message: Zama ukulungisa ukukhangela kwakho okanye izihluzi

login.title: Ngena kwiSayonika
login.username_placeholder: Ngenisa igama lomsebenzisi okanye idilesi ye-imeyile
login.username_help: Ungasebenzisa igama lakho lomsebenzisi okanye idilesi ye-imeyile ukungena

translation.enabled: Ukuguqulela kuvuliwe. Umxholo uya kuguqulelwa xa ufumaneka.

section_backgrounds.title: Ingasemva
section_backgrounds.subtitle: Yenza i-Doki Doki Mod Manager yakho ibe yeyakho ngesinye sezi zinto ezingasemva.
section_backgrounds.description_credit: Izinto ezingasemva zoqobo ze-DDLC zivela kwiQela i-Salvato.

section_storage.title: Indawo Yokugcina
section_storage.subtitle: Guqula apho kugcinwa khona idatha yakho yomdlalo.
section_storage.description_moving: Isilumkiso! Ukuba ukhetha ukuguqula indawo yakho yokufakela, zonke iimodi zakho, iifakelo kunye nedatha yokugcina ziya kusiwa. Oku kungathatha imizuzu eliqela, kwaye akukwazi ukuphazanyiswa.

section_updates.title: Uhlaziyo
section_updates.subtitle: Fumana uhlobo lwamva nje lwe-Doki Doki Mod Manager.

section_sdk.title: Izinto Eziphunyeziweyo & SDK
section_sdk.subtitle: Guqula indlela ekusingathwa ngayo izinto eziphunyeziweyo.

section_testing.title: SDK Debug
section_testing.subtitle: Vula ukungena kwe-debug ukuze uvavanye iimodi zakho nge-Doki Doki Mod Manager SDK.

section_language.title: Ululwimi
section_language.subtitle: Guqula ululwimi lwe-Doki Doki Mod Manager.
section_language.description_restart: Utshintsho lolulwimi luya kusebenza emva kokuqala kwakhona isicelo.
section_language.notification_changed: Ululwimi lutshintshiwe lwaba {0}. Nceda uqale kwakhona isicelo ukuze ubone utshintsho.

tab_about.title: Malunga
tab_about.description: I-Doki Doki Mod Manager yiprojekthi ephuhliswe luluntu ekunceda ufumane, ufake kwaye udlale iimodi ze-Doki Doki Literature Club, umdlalo weVisual Novel wasimahla ovela kwiQela i-Salvato.
tab_about.disclaimer_1: I-Doki Doki Mod Manager ngumsebenzi wabalandeli be-Doki Doki Literature Club kwaye ayixhunyanisiwe neQela i-Salvato. Ngumsebenzi wabalandeli, njengoko kuchaziwe kwizikhokelo ze-IP zeQela i-Salvato.
tab_about.disclaimer_2: I-Doki Doki Mod Manager ayithathi uxanduva ngayo nayiphi na ingozi ebangelwe kwiifayile zakho okanye kwikhompyutha, ngenxa yokudlala imodi okanye ngenye indlela. Kukuwe ukuqinisekisa ukuba iimodi zikhuselekile ukuba zingadlalwa.

jumplist.task_launch: Vula i-Doki Doki Mod Manager kwaye uqalise {0}.

running_cover.description_running: Vala umdlalo ukuze wenze utshintsho kwiimodi zakho.

shortcut_dialog.title: Khetha apho uza kubeka khona indlela yakho emfutshane

exception.title: I-Doki Doki Mod Manager yawa
exception.body: Ingxaki ixelwe. Nceda uqale kwakhona kwaye uzame kwakhona.

move_install.title: Ayiphumelelanga ukuhambisa ifolda yokufaka
move_install.body: Jonga ukuba unayo imvume kunye nendawo eyaneleyo yokuhambisa kule folda.

shortcut.title: Ayiphumelelanga ukwenza indlela emfutshane
shortcut.body: Jonga ukuba unayo imvume yokwenza iifayile kule folda.

install.title: Ayiphumelelanga ukufaka umdlalo
install.body: Jonga ukuba unayo imvume kunye nendawo eyaneleyo yokufaka.

rename.title: Ayiphumelelanga ukuqamba kwakhona
rename.body: Jonga ukuba uzivale zonke iiprogram ezinokuthi ziphazamise kwaye uzame kwakhona.

uninstall.title: Ayiphumelelanga ukukhupha
uninstall.body: Jonga ukuba uzivale zonke iiprogram ezinokuthi ziphazamise kwaye uzame kwakhona.

save_delete.title: Ayiphumelelanga ukucima idatha yokugcina
save_delete.body: Jonga ukuba uzivale zonke iiprogram ezinokuthi ziphazamise kwaye uzame kwakhona.

mod_delete.title: Ayiphumelelanga ukucima imodi
mod_delete.body: Jonga ukuba uzivale zonke iiprogram ezinokuthi ziphazamise kwaye uzame kwakhona.

renderer_freeze.title: I-Doki Doki Mod Manager iyekile ukuphendula
renderer_freeze.body: Ukuba le ngxaki ihlala ixesha elide, vala isicelo kwaye uqale kwakhona.

executable_permission.title: Ayiphumelelanga ukwenza umdlalo ube nokusebenziseka
executable_permission.body: Ayikwazanga ukwenza i-DDLC.sh ibe nokusebenziseka kwi-Linux. Umdlalo usenokungaqali kakuhle.
